fields.name: booster
fields.title: Booster
fields.description: Select the type of model to run at each iteration. It has 2 options: gbtree: tree-based models & gblinear: linear models

fields.name: silent
fields.title: Silent
fields.description: Silent mode is activated is set to 1, i.e. no running messages will be printed

fields.name: nthread
fields.title: NThread
fields.description: If you wish to run on all cores, value should not be entered and algorithm will detect automatically

fields.name: objective
fields.title: Objective
fields.description: This defines the loss function to be minimized

fields.name: numTrees
fields.title: Num Trees
fields.description: The number of rounds for boosting

fields.name: numClasses
fields.title: Num Classes
fields.description: For Objective: multi:softmax, you also need to set an additional num_class (number of classes) parameter defining the number of unique classes

fields.name: seed
fields.title: Seed
fields.description: Can be used for generating reproducible results and also for parameter tuning

nodes.name: Predict
nodes.description: Predict node takes in a DataFrame and Model and makes predictions
nodes.details: Predict node takes in a DataFrame and Model and makes predictions on the data using the Model.
